name: gemini-chat-exporter
description: Chrome extension to export Gemini conversations to Markdown or Word with preserved formatting

scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p libs && cp node_modules/docx/build/index.umd.js libs/docx.js && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.js libs/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.css libs/
scripts.reload: echo 'Open chrome://extensions/ and click the reload icon for Gemini Chat Exporter'
